section.p: You can delete a language-support file when you no longer need it. You may want to do this, for example, if you no longer translate from or into this language.

section.title: Calling sequence
section.p:
Select:
Display language list from the Utilities menu
The language-support file to delete
Delete from the File menu

section.title: Options and parameters
section.p:
Before deletes the selected language-support file, you are asked to confirm your request:
Select Yes to delete the language-support file.
Select No to cancel the delete request.

section.title: Results
section.p: If you select Yes, the language-support file is deleted. Otherwise, it remains unchanged. A reference to this source language may still exist in certain folders, dictionaries, and . Update the respective properties so that the deleted language-support file is no longer referred to.
